title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find this wool sweater to be well-made, soft, and comfortable, with one noting it's not stiff at all. Customers like the color variety, with one describing the red as deep, and they find it not too itchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome sweater!!
items.body: Fantastic sweater! I am between sizes M-L and ordered an L. It fits very well, it is soft, and the color is earthy. Very comfy as well. Read more
items.author: Isa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price and well made
items.body: Soft and medium weight. I washed them in a mesh bag with other clothing and hung to dry. They came out fine. The colors are nice and I'll be getting a lot of use from them this winter season. Read more
items.author: Extractdigit

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, slightly different color
items.body: Unbelievably good quality for the price point. Sturdy stitching, great quality wool fabric. Soft and not too itchy. Thin, but warm, so it's great for layering. The color is more burnt -orange than brown, but still a great color for autumn. Will definitely buy again in more colors! Read more
items.author: Shelby Hixson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice and soft
items.body: I LOVE this sweater! I love the caramel color and it feels very nice on. I got both the medium and the large and wound up returning the large. The medium fit slightly baggy but tailored in my shoulders. It was a more flattering fit. Get it! (I’m 5’4” and have a slightly muscular build.) Read more
items.author: E. M. Mcgovern

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to your wardrobe.
items.body: I am 5'10", about 160 pounds. I bought this in a medium and a large. The large fits like it does in the product picture, so a more relaxed style. The medium was my suggested size from Amazon. This fits as well, but in a more tailored type of way. I will keep both sizes. The sleeves on both sizes are long enough, which can sometimes be a struggle for someone my height. The material is soft for a wool sweater, only slightly scratchy, but it will soften up with use. The material is a nice weight. It is thick enough to be warm but thin enough to be a little drapey. It is not a stiff wool at all. I bough it in the green and the khaki. Both colors are nice and accurate to the photos. I will most likely buy a few more in different colors. This is a great addition to a New Englander's wardrobe, I'm sure I will be wearing then from the end of October to the end of April. Read more
items.author: Cici

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great items for price ! Quality is great.
items.body: Love this dark gray sweater so much. Its light yet warm, fits exactly as I hoped it would. I have several other sweaters from this company, all are wonderful, great quality & wonderful prices. Some are large others large, some i wanted larger for style and wearing a tee shirt under. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Please Make this Longer in the Torso.
items.body: Very pretty if a shorter person. Sleeves long enough, body quite short. Fabric & style very nice. Came smelling like it had been soaked in Gain or Tide BOOSTED SCENT detergent. Read more
items.author: California Girl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost TOO blue
items.body: On the upside, it’s a lovely sweater and very comfortable and soft. Will have to see, as the weather gets colder, how it actually holds up! It seems to run a bit small, but still fits. My only criticism is that the blue is so incredibly saturated that it looks black. I had to really look, try it in different light, and next to several other colors to see that it was actually blue. Read more
items.author: ReadsALot

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Brown, Gray, Blue, Apricot, Deep Gray, Black, Lake, Navy Blue, Dark Red, Red, Khaki, Beige, Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
